markdownRemark.excerpt: I have meant to create my first blog for the longest now, but I think today is the day that I can cross out that task from my todo-list. This blog will hold meâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
I have meant to create my first blog for the longest now, but I think today is the day that I can cross out that task from my todo-list.

This blog will hold me accountable for learning programming, which has been my goal for a while now. It will also help me document my life as a college student, and I can also upload school work here.

That is it for this first post. I do not know how many people will read this, but oh well, haber que pasa!.

frontmatter.title: Hello Mundo
frontmatter.description: A little post describing what this blog will be about
